overview: The film tracks the life of Anirudh (Adam Harry), a trans man, formerly Anitta, who lives close to his home, to stay in touch with his mother. However, the transition unfolds, as the mother passes away. Sub-inspector Sunny Thomas (Sunny Wayne) decides to inform Anitta, the long-lost daughter, about the death of her mother, and the search opens a whole new world in front of him.
title: Binary Error
